chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This plug-in provides extra utility widgets for the Geomajas GWT faces (both SmartGWT and PureGWT). These widgets are not necessarily GIS related. Examples are a Ribbon (office like toolbar), a Wizard, a file upload widget, etc.
In order to know which widgets, are already present within this plug-in, visit the roadmap on the Geomajas issue tracker.

caution.remark: At this moment, all widgets are based upon the SmartGWT widget library, and are thus best used within the Geomajas SmartGWT face.
